issue.title: set model configuration not work with bullet

content.raw:
I don't think that is the API used by `set_model_configuration`; instead, [it uses `Model::SetJointPositions()`](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/6a8202411e3ea00fc22b197c248caac56f271fd9/gazebo_ros/src/gazebo_ros_api_plugin.cpp#L1695-L1741).

Gazebo `Model` instances do have a PID based controller for joints on a model. It can be accessed [from `Model::GetJointController()`](f/gazebo/src/01c7f8b1d68448bc618b575ad1c7ec13fee2b87f/gazebo/physics/Model.hh#lines-379). The API documentation for [`JointController()` is here](http://osrf-distributions.s3.amazonaws.com/gazebo/api/9.0.0/classgazebo_1_1physics_1_1JointController.html).
content.html:
I don't think that is the API used by set_model_configuration; instead, it uses Model::SetJointPositions().

Gazebo Model instances do have a PID based controller for joints on a model. It can be accessed from Model::GetJointController(). The API documentation for JointController() is here.
